https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rDEaF2sPFwEh4T7d5Bqvsy6HFG3.jpg "After the Denim" is the story of James Packer, a retired accountant and recovering alcoholic who transforms from a bristly, argumentative, resentful man stuck in the routines of his own preferences into a husband capable of compassion for others. After the Denim
